analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HoldPresaleContract.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#353-372):
	External calls:
	- OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[contributor].tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#364-370)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderList (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#367-368)

OpportyPresale.getTokensBack (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#547-555) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#552-555)

OpportyPresale2.getTokensBack (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#773-781) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#780-781)

	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getBalanceContract() >= tokenRaised) (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#539-540)
	- token.transfer(holdContract,tokenRaised) (/unique_chucks/10/0x94554c78bd90dc7047f1a400dd3c5730991d9484.sol#540-547)
	State variables written after the call(s):
